name: Myco-Cosmotechnics
description:
In a post-anthropocene world, the boundary between nature and technology dissolves, and humans thrive in symbiosis with natural technologies. Myco-Cosmotechnics speculates a heterotopia where technological systems are developed out of fungal mechanisms. Individual humans wear fungal facewear for radically personalized biometric data self-tracking.

Wendi Yan
2021

www.wendiyan.com
ins: @wendiyan
